      Creates a buffer of the given size to create a Column of type id Column.TypeId.DATE_TIME.
      static DateTimeBuffer Buffers.dateTimeBuffer​(Column column)
      Creates a buffer to create a Column of type Column.TypeId.DATE_TIME by copying the data from the given column.
